#### About Us

Located seven miles northwest of Denton in west central Denton County, Krum is 47 miles northwest of Dallas and 42 miles northeast of Fort Worth.

[Learn More](https://cityofkrum.com/community/)

[Current Budget](https://drive.google.com/file/d/1K1E5Lylo4pSQ4rjGvna5pqi4fhN8_VVU/view?usp=sharing) [Water Quality Report](https://mygov.report/wxi)
